item.title: Various Packet Switching Techniques
item.description: 1990s: Layer 2 Switches 2000s: The Introduction of Layer 3 Switches 2010: Modern L3 Switches Clos Network and ECMP Support Network Virtualization Support SDN Support Scalability Considerations 2020: SmartSwitches (Distributed Service Switches) Join my email list to get direct access to new blog posts.
